fields.text: Thank you for calling Circle Medical in San Francisco, where we support your wellness exams, illness care, chronic condition management, mental health, prescriptions, and more.
To schedule or manage appointments, press [INDEX].
For wellness exams and preventive care visits, press [INDEX].
For illness or injury consultations, press [INDEX].
For prescription refills and pharmacy services, billing inquiries, or other support, press [INDEX].
To request prescription refills or prior authorizations, press [INDEX].
For billing questions and insurance assistance, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our scheduling team for wellness and preventive care visits.
Please hold while we transfer you to a care provider for illness and injury consultations.
Please hold while we connect you to our pharmacy services department for prescription refills.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and insurance specialists.
